item.title: Houdini - HDA
item.description: The notes below are based on info found in the Houdini docs as well as other sources. Digital Asset Tips Asset Definition Toolbar The asset definition toolbar shows the name space and version info of the HDA and can be useful to enable: Assets > Asset Definition Toolbar > Show Menu Always Creation For a really nice and streamlined workflow of creating HDA you can use the SideFx Labs Digital Asset RMB menu.
